q: ( AFP)- Cuban dissident Guillermo Farinas, the 2010 Sakharov rights prize winner, has been arrested and police are holding him in the central city of Santa Clara, his mother and dissidents said. I spoke with him, and he told me that he is under arrest in the third police unit in Santa Clara, and then he hung up, his mother Alicia Hernandez said by phone from the city located some 240 kilometers( 150 miles) east of Havana. Muglia will apparently continue to run the division until summer, while his soon-to-be-former CEO conducts an internal and external search for a new leader. Muglia is just the latest in a raft of executive departures from Microsoft. In October 2010, Steve Ballmer announced the resignation of Chief Software Architect Ray Ozzie , who had helped shape the company's cloud strategy.
